text: A.S. Monaco F.C. is a football club which plays in Monaco. It plays in the French football league system, and currently plays in the Ligue 1. == League titles == * Ligue 1 : 8 ** 1960/61, 1962/63, 1977/78, 1981/82, 1987/88, 1996/97, 1999/00, 2016/17 * Ligue 2 : 1 ** 2012/13 ==Coupe de France== * 1960, 1963, 1980, 1985, 1991 ==Coupe de la Ligue== * 2003 == League position == Season League Position 2000/01 Division 1 11th 2001/02 Division 1 15th 2002/03 Ligue 1 2nd 2003/04 Ligue 1 3rd 2004/05 Ligue 1 3rd 2005/06 Ligue 1 10th 2006/07 Ligue 1 9th 2007/08 Ligue 1 12th 2008/09 Ligue 1 11th 2009/10 Ligue 1 8th Season League Position 2010/11 Ligue 1 18th 2011/12 Ligue 2 8th 2012/13 Ligue 2 Champions 2013/14 Ligue 1 2nd 2014/15 Ligue 1 3rd 2015/16 Ligue 1 3rd 2016/17 Ligue 1 Champions 2017/18 Ligue 1 2nd 2018/19 Ligue 1 17th 2019/20 Ligue 1 9th 2020/21 Ligue 1 3rd === Former position === Category:French football clubs
title: AS Monaco F.C.
